pageContent: Background: We compared the clinical outcomes between whole-gland ablation (WGA) and partial gland ablation (PGA) using the high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) technique for localized prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
Principles and results of high-intensity focused ultrasound for localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15452554/
